definition.name: Azure Spring Apps
definition.description: Deploy applications to Azure Spring Apps and manage deployments.
definition.author: azure

inputs.name: azure-subscription
inputs.description: Select the Azure Resource Manager subscription for the deployment.

inputs.name: action
inputs.description: Action to be performed on Azure Spring Apps.

inputs.name: service-name
inputs.description: Select the Azure Spring Apps service to which to deploy.

inputs.name: app-name
inputs.description: Select the Azure Spring Apps app to deploy.

inputs.name: use-staging-deployment
inputs.description: Automatically select the deployment that's set as Staging at the time the task runs.

inputs.name: create-new-deployment
inputs.description: Whether to target the deployment that's set as Staging at the time of execution. If unchecked, the 'Deployment Name' setting must be set.

inputs.name: deployment-name
inputs.description: The deployment to which this task will apply. Lowercase letters, - and numbers only; must start with a letter.

inputs.name: package
inputs.description: File path to the package or a folder containing the Spring Apps app contents.

inputs.name: target-module
inputs.description: Child module to be deployed, required for multiple jar packages built from source code.

inputs.name: cpu
inputs.description: The CPU resource quantity. It should be 500m or number of CPU cores. It is effective only when creating new deployment.

inputs.name: memory
inputs.description: The memory resource quantity. It should be 512Mi or #Gi, e.g., 1Gi, 3Gi. It is effective only when creating new deployment.

inputs.name: environment-variables
inputs.description: Edit the app's environment variables.

inputs.name: jvm-options
inputs.description: Edit the app's JVM options. A String containing JVM Options. Example: `-Xms1024m -Xmx2048m`

inputs.name: runtime-version
inputs.description: The runtime on which the app will run.

inputs.name: dotnetcore-mainentry-path
inputs.description: The path to the .NET executable relative to zip root.

inputs.name: version
inputs.description: The runtime on which the app will run.

inputs.name: build-name
inputs.description: (Enterprise Tier Only) The build name.

inputs.name: builder
inputs.description: (Enterprise Tier Only) Build service builder used to build the executable.

inputs.name: build-cpu
inputs.description: (Enterprise Tier Only) CPU resource quantity for build container. Should be 500m or number of CPU cores. Default: 1

inputs.name: build-memory
inputs.description: (Enterprise Tier Only) Memory resource quantity for build container. Should be 512Mi or #Gi, e.g., 1Gi, 3Gi. Default: 2Gi.

inputs.name: build-env
inputs.description: (Enterprise Tier Only) Space-separated environment variables for the build process in 'key[=value]' format.

inputs.name: config-file-patterns
inputs.description: (Enterprise Tier Only) Config file patterns separated with ',' to decide which patterns of Application Configuration Service will be used. Use '""' to clear existing configurations.

inputs.name: container-registry
inputs.description: The registry of the container image.  Default: docker.io.

inputs.name: registry-username
inputs.description: The username of the container registry.

inputs.name: registry-password
inputs.description: The password of the container registry.

inputs.name: container-image
inputs.description: The container image.

inputs.name: container-command
inputs.description: The command of the container.

inputs.name: container-args
inputs.description: The arguments of the container.

inputs.name: language-framework
inputs.description: The language framework of the container.

inputs.name: enable-liveness-probe
inputs.description: If false, will disable the liveness probe of the app instance.  Allowed values: false, true.

inputs.name: enable-readiness-probe
inputs.description: If false, will disable the readiness probe of the app instance.  Allowed values: false, true.

inputs.name: enable-startup-probe
inputs.description: If false, will disable the startup probe of the app instance.  Allowed values: false, true.

inputs.name: termination-grace-period-seconds
inputs.description: Optional duration in seconds the app instance needs to terminate gracefully.

inputs.name: liveness-probe-config
inputs.description: A json file path indicates the liveness probe config

inputs.name: readiness-probe-config
inputs.description: A json file path indicates the readiness probe config

inputs.name: startup-probe-config
inputs.description: A json file path indicates the startup probe config
